Payment Rails | Backend Software Developer | Montreal, Canada | FULLTIME | Onsite | https://www.paymentrails.com

Payment Rails is creating a platform that helps the gig economy get paid. We are a payouts platform that allows merchants to manage the payment to their contractors, vendors or even royalty payments in the easiest way possible worldwide.

We're looking for another developer who can help build our API platform from integrations to customer features. Technologies used: TypeScript, Postgres, AWS -- with a React frontend.

For more information contact: david@paymentrails.com
